docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: For now, this documentation is just a placeholder.

docs.title: Configuration values
docs.text:
• log-level (optional True)

Log level, one of: trace, debug, info, warning, error, critical

  • search-dirs (optional False)

Directories to search for videos in. Must be a list of one or more strings OR dictionaries like { path = <path>, recurse = <bool>, ignore = <bool> }

  • channel-mode (optional True)

Channel mode. Must be one of random, random-deterministic, alphabetical, config-only, config-first-random, config-first-alphabetical, config-first-random-deterministic

  • aspect-mode (optional True)

None

  • static-time (optional True)

None

  • show-fps (optional True)

None

  • channel-osd-always-on (optional True)

None

  • disable-osd (optional True)

None

  • save-place-while-browsing (optional True)

None

  • starting-volume (optional True)

None

  • static-time-between-channels (optional True)

None

  • web-password (optional True)

None

  • audio-visualization (optional True)

None

  • crt-filter (optional True)

None

  • subtitles-default-on (optional True)

None

  • power-key-shutdown (optional True)

None

  • ratings (optional True)

None

  • overscan-margins (optional True)

None

  • valid-file-extensions (optional True)

None

  • mpv-options (optional True)

None

  • keyboard (optional True)

  • ir-remote (optional True)

  • video (optional True)

None
